history.proof: intros n m p H1 H2. qsimpl time: 1 use: Zmult_ge_reg_r,Zpos. qsimpl time: 1 use: Zge_trans,Zmult_ge_reg_r,Zpos,Z. rewrite Z.mul_comm in H2. qsimpl time: 1 use: Zge_trans,Zmult_ge_reg_r,Zpos,Z. qsimpl time: 1 use: Zge_trans,Zmult_ge_reg_r,Zpos,Z. qsimpl time: 1 use: Zge_trans,Zmult_ge_compat_l,Zpos,Z,Zmult_ge_reg_r. qsimpl time: 1 use: Zge_trans,Zmult_ge_compat_l,Zpos,Z,Zmult_ge_reg_r. qsimpl time: 1 use: Zge_trans,Zmult_ge_compat_l,Zpos,Z,Zmult_ge_reg_r. qsimpl time: 1 use: Zge_trans,Zmult_ge_compat_l,Zpos,Z,Zmult_ge_reg_r. hauto l: on drew: off use: Z.mul_comm, Znot_ge_lt, Z.gt_lt_iff, Z.mul_lt_mono_pos_l unfold: Z.ge, Z.lt, Z.gt.

ctx: intros n m p H1 H2.
exceptions.tactic: apply Zmult_ge_reg_r with (p:=Zpos p) in H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment n, m, p : Z H1 : p > 0 H2 : p * n >= p * m The term "p" has type "Z" while it is expected to have type "positive".

ctx: intros n m p H1 H2.
exceptions.tactic: apply Zge_trans with (m:=Z.mul (Zpos p) n) in H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment H0 : positive -> Z H : forall n m p : Z, p > 0 -> n * p >= m * p -> n >= m n, m, p : Z H2 : p * n >= p * m H4 : (p ?= 0) = Gt The term "p" has type "Z" while it is expected to have type "positive".

ctx: intros n m p H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "?M2351 * ?M2352" in the current goal.

ctx: intros n m p H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall n m p : Z, p <> 0 -> p * n = p * m -> n = m" on hypothesis of type "n * p >= p * m".

ctx: intros n m p H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment H8 : positive -> Z H3 : forall n m p : Z, p > 0 -> n * p >= m * p -> n >= m H1 : forall n m p : Z, n >= m -> m >= p -> n >= p H7, H5, H0 : positive -> Z n, m, p : Z H2 : n * p >= p * m H4 : (p ?= 0) = Gt Unable to unify "(?M3269 * ?M3267 ?= ?M3269 * ?M3268) = Lt" with "(n ?= m) = Lt".

ctx: intros n m p H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment H10 : forall n m p : Z, p > 0 -> n * p >= m * p -> n >= m H9 : positive -> Z H6 : forall n m p : Z, n >= m -> p >= 0 -> p * n >= p * m H : forall n m p : Z, n >= m -> m >= p -> n >= p H8, H7, H5, H0 : positive -> Z n, m, p : Z H2 : n * p >= p * m H4 : (p ?= 0) = Gt Unable to unify "(0 ?= ?M3855 * ?M3856) = Gt" with "(n ?= m) = Lt".

ctx: intros n m p H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment H12 : forall n m p : Z, p > 0 -> n * p >= m * p -> n >= m H11 : positive -> Z H3 : forall n m p : Z, n >= m -> p >= 0 -> p * n >= p * m H1 : forall n m p : Z, n >= m -> m >= p -> n >= p H9, H8, H7, H5, H0 : positive -> Z n, m, p : Z H2 : n * p >= p * m H4 : (p ?= 0) = Gt Unable to unify "(?M4464 ?= ?M4463) = Gt" with "(n ?= m) = Lt".

ctx: intros n m p H1 H2.

original: intros n m p H1 H2. apply Zmult_ge_reg_r with (p:=Zpos p) in H2. apply Zge_trans with (m:=Z.mul (Zpos p) n) in H2. - rewrite Z.mul_comm in H2. rewrite Z.mul_comm. apply Z.mul_reg_l in H2. auto. - apply Zmult_ge_compat_l. + apply Z.mul_nonneg_nonneg. + apply Z.ge_le. + apply Z.ge_le in H1. auto.
